snippet: A group of Latin jazz musicians are planning to hold a concert in Los Angeles on the same night as the Grammy Awards to protest the decision that eliminated 31 categories from this year's awards, protest organizers announced Monday.
abstract: A group of Latin jazz musicians are planning to hold a concert in Los Angeles on the same night as the Grammy Awards to protest the decision that eliminated 31 categories from this year's awards, protest organizers announced Monday.

headline.main: With No Place at Grammys, Latin Jazz Artists Plan Their Own Concert
headline.print_headline: Latin Jazz Musicians Plan Grammy Protest
